wikipedia_page.main: Elsie Noël Dyson (23 December 1916 – 29 June 1995) was an English character actressDyson appeared in a number of stage and films (including telemovies) but is best remembered as a versatile television character actress in serials who became a familiar face to British viewers in a career spanning almost 50 years from 1949 until her death. Dyson's best remembered roles are as matriarch Ida Barlow, one of the original characters in the long-running soap opera Coronation Street (1960–61), and Nanny in the sitcom Father, Dear Father (1968–73).
